column4: When I open 'Services settings', a blank window opens and it just sits there. How can I fix this?
When I open 'Services settings', a blank window opens and it just sits there. How can I fix this?
Man were you with the nick Justi2 yesterday?
if yes... the other guy that used an ATI card found a way to make it work if I remember well. If you remember his name he could help you.
